content: A `Tooltip` is a small pop-up that displays information on hover or focus. It wraps a trigger element.
Tooltips support different `colors`, `sizes`, and `radius`. The `placement` and `offset` props control its position relative to the trigger. An arrow can be shown with `showArrow`.
You can control the open and close `delay`. A tooltip can be controlled programmatically using the `isOpen` prop.
The two main slots are `base` (the popover itself) and `content`.
